A '''mason''' is a [[villager]] that [[trade]]s polished stones, terracotta, clay, glazed terracotta and quartz. Masons wear a black apron and black gloves.

== Spawning ==
An unemployed [[villager]] turns into a mason when an unclaimed [[stonecutter]] is nearby.

=== Natural generation ===
The workstation of masons, the [[stonecutter]], generates in the mason house in [[village]]s.

== Drops ==
{{IN|java}}, a mason can drop [[clay]] by throwing it as a gift towards a nearby player with the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.
